item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.artisan_: Allows the creation of advanced materials & bookshelves, and saves you a lot of Experience.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.crescent: Allows the creation of magical charms, and reduces the required Aureal depending on the time of day.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.crimson_: Allows the creation of ritual tablets, and heavily decreases the amount of required souls
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.elementa: Allows the creation of elemental items.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.divine_p: Allows the creation of Enchanter's Tools and the Eternal Stella.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.maledict: Allows the creation of the Cursed Eye.
item.forbidden_arcanus.enhancer.soul_cri: Completely removes the essence requirement for a ritual
